about_the_game:
Explore the universe in this cyberpunk single-player, with a little cow that will leave you upside down.



There are several folk tales and urban legends about aliens abducting cows, but what happens to the cows after they are abducted?
On a peaceful planet inhabited by cows that only walk, graze and fart, an innocent cow is abducted to a strange planet and placed in a prison.
Once she manages to escape, she begins to explore the new world looking for ways to return home.
What was once just another cow in the pasture becomes an individual with personality, fears and desires.
Your journey goes beyond discovering other worlds: it is a discovery of yourself.

360º PLATAFORM


Move around the entire planet and make the ceiling turn into the floor with gravity switching mechanics.

REPAIR THE SHIP


Find and collect the necessary parts to repair a broken ship and take the character away from there.

DEFEAT ENEMIES AND SOLVE PUZZLES


Each planet will have different enemies to defeat and puzzles to solve. Think carefully before making a move: it could be your last!

MIMOSAS


Mooh wasn't the only one to be abducted! To save other cows, which we affectionately call “mimosas”, you need to find the cells in which they are trapped and free them. The mimosas join you inside the ship as traveling companions.
The more mimosas you set free, a different skin you'll see!

LEARN NEW SKILLS


Inside the ship, Mooh can learn new skills that will help you explore the next planet. Most skills can be used both for puzzles and to attack enemies.
With each skill learned, more cyberpunk Mooh becomes!
detailed_description:
BRAGI ESTÚDIOS

We are an indie studio from Bahia, Brazil. We are, in addition to developers, creators of experiences. MOOH is our first project for PC and we are very excited to share it with you.

We want to build our games with you! Join our community and become a playtester:

FINANCIAL SUPPORT

This project was included in the Paulo Gustavo Bahia Notices and has financial support from the Government of the State of Bahia (Brazil) through the Secretariat of Culture of Brazil via the Paulo Gustavo Law, directed by the Ministry of Culture, Brazilian Federal Government. Paulo Gustavo Bahia (PGBA) was created to carry out emergency actions to support the cultural sector, aiming to comply with Complementary Law No. 195, of July 8, 2022.


About the Game



Explore the universe in this cyberpunk single-player, with a little cow that will leave you upside down.



There are several folk tales and urban legends about aliens abducting cows, but what happens to the cows after they are abducted?
On a peaceful planet inhabited by cows that only walk, graze and fart, an innocent cow is abducted to a strange planet and placed in a prison.
Once she manages to escape, she begins to explore the new world looking for ways to return home.
What was once just another cow in the pasture becomes an individual with personality, fears and desires.
Your journey goes beyond discovering other worlds: it is a discovery of yourself.

360º PLATAFORM


Move around the entire planet and make the ceiling turn into the floor with gravity switching mechanics.

REPAIR THE SHIP


Find and collect the necessary parts to repair a broken ship and take the character away from there.

DEFEAT ENEMIES AND SOLVE PUZZLES


Each planet will have different enemies to defeat and puzzles to solve. Think carefully before making a move: it could be your last!

MIMOSAS


Mooh wasn't the only one to be abducted! To save other cows, which we affectionately call “mimosas”, you need to find the cells in which they are trapped and free them. The mimosas join you inside the ship as traveling companions.
The more mimosas you set free, a different skin you'll see!

Inside the ship, Mooh can learn new skills that will help you explore the next planet. Most skills can be used both for puzzles and to attack enemies.
With each skill learned, more cyberpunk Mooh becomes!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.11 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3210M (2 * 2500)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 530
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.11 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-5350U (2 * 1800)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: Mooh

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel i3+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GT (256 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 GTS (512 MB)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: An adventure in space through a cow that was abducted and is trying to return home. Explore the planets, solve puzzles, save the mimosas and collect parts to improve the ship that will take Mooh back home.
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
